tuv.seg: It was produced between 1964 and 1966 using a combination of [[marionette]] puppetry and [[scale-model]] special effects sequences – a hybrid filming technique known as "[[Supermarionation]]".

Dit is geproduseer tussen 1964 en 1966 deur die gebruik van 'n kombinasie van [[pop]] poppespel en [[skaalmodel]]spesiale effekte sequences & nbsp * – 'n hibriede filmtegniek bekend as "[[supermarionation]]".
Since its inception, the programme has enjoyed broad support from the UK's main political parties.
Sedert die skema se stigting, het die program wye ondersteuning van die VK se belangrikste polotike partye ontvang.

Two series comprising a total of 32 episodes were filmed; production ceased after the Andersons' financial backer, [[Lew Grade]], failed in his efforts to sell the programme to American network television.

Twee reekse wat uit 'n totaal van 32 episodes is verfilm; produksie gestaak nadat die Andersons se borg, [[Lew Grade]], gefaal het in sy pogings om die reeks te verkoop aan Amerikaanse netwerktelevisie.
